sub_title: Head of Marketing and Business development manager @WEART haptics
summary:
I am a marketing and business development manager with a study background in management and have a Masters's of business administration specializing in marketing and sales management. In addition, I have around ten years of work experience in an international environment in digital marketing, advertising, field marketing, and business development. I also have a filmmaking degree and work in the media and movies industry in a concise term in multiple film and advertisement projects.
Have a chance to work in different companies with business models in fashion, tech startups, and E-commerce. One of the recent experiences I catch is helping small businesses and startups with branding, marketing, and business process with internationalization. I am currently active in the Virtual reality and extended reality market with the current startup that I am working.
